metadata.description: Comprehensive JIRA automation skills for Claude Code - 14 specialized skills covering issue management, agile workflows, time tracking, service management, and more. Natural language JIRA automation with zero JQL memorization.

plugins.name: jira-assistant
plugins.description: Meta-skill router that automatically routes requests to the appropriate JIRA skill

plugins.name: jira-issue
plugins.description: Core CRUD operations for JIRA issues - create, read, update, delete tickets with full field support

plugins.name: jira-lifecycle
plugins.description: Workflow and transition management - control issue status changes, assignments, versions, and components

plugins.name: jira-search
plugins.description: JQL queries, saved filters, JQL builder/validator, and bulk search operations with export support

plugins.name: jira-collaborate
plugins.description: Comments, attachments, and watchers for issue collaboration and team communication

plugins.name: jira-agile
plugins.description: Agile/Scrum workflows - epics, sprints, backlog management, story points, and velocity tracking

plugins.name: jira-relationships
plugins.description: Issue linking and dependency management - blockers, clones, relationships, and dependency chain analysis

plugins.name: jira-time
plugins.description: Time tracking, worklogs, estimates, and time reports with billing integration support

plugins.name: jira-jsm
plugins.description: Jira Service Management - service desks, requests, SLAs, queues, customers, approvals, and knowledge base

plugins.name: jira-bulk
plugins.description: Bulk operations at scale - transitions, assignments, priorities, and cloning with dry-run preview and rollback safety

plugins.name: jira-dev
plugins.description: Developer workflow integration - Git branch names, commit parsing, PR descriptions, and CI/CD integration

plugins.name: jira-fields
plugins.description: Custom field management, Agile field configuration, and project field discovery

plugins.name: jira-ops
plugins.description: Cache management, request batching, and operational utilities for performance optimization

plugins.name: jira-admin
plugins.description: Project administration - permissions, schemes, users, and project configuration management
